import React,{useState} from "react" import ts from "./Tasks.module.css"; import TaskShowDetailsIcon from "./TaskShowDetaliesIcon"; const TaskDetails = (props) => { let [ShowDetails, SetShowDetails] = useState(false) const ShowDetailsON = () => { SetShowDetails(true) } const ShowDetailsOFF = () => { SetShowDetails(false) } return
{ShowDetails ?
start
deadline
description
:
}
} export default TaskDetails
